Title: AN ACT REMITTING THE BOND OF TWENTY-FIVE HUNDRED PESOS FURNISHED BY JOSE NAZARENO IN THE CASE OF "THE PEOPLE OF THE PHILIPPINE ISLANDS VERSUS JOSE CASTRO Y OBREGON ET AL."
Data:
[ Acts No. 4191, December 08, 1934 ]
AN ACT REMITTING THE BOND OF TWENTY-FIVE HUNDRED PESOS FURNISHED BY JOSE NAZARENO IN THE CASE OF "THE PEOPLE OF THE PHILIPPINE ISLANDS VERSUS JOSE CASTRO Y OBREGON ET AL."
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The bond of twenty-five hundred pesos furnished by Jose Nazareno in favor of the Philippine Government for the provisional release of Jose Castro y Obregon in criminal case No. 33547 of the Court of First Instance of Manila, entitled "The People of the Philippine Islands versus Jose Castro y Obregon, et al.," which has been declared forfeited by said court, is hereby remitted after the expenses actually incurred by the Government in the execution of the said bail bond have been deducted.1a—àphi1
Section 2. This Act shall take effect on its approval.
Approved, December 8, 1934.
